--- title: dialga.dataset keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Contains commonly used dataset operations which include splitting and creation of validation sets based on various stratergies." ---
{% raw %}

class FilteredDataset[source]

FilteredDataset(dataset, wanted_labels=[]) :: Dataset

dataset : Any Pytorch Dataset wanted_labels : Iterable Containning the labels that are required

Eg: label_5_dataset = FilteredDataset(MNIST(root='',download=True), [5]) print(len(label_5_dataset))

{% endraw %}
